justification: “Participants were asked to rate the NASA Task Load Index (NASA-TLX)… to measure their cognitive load during the tasks.”

measured_by: 101-point Likert scale (0 = non-stressful to 100 = very stressful)
justification: “Participants were asked to rate … their subjective stress in their judgments (0: nonstressful – 100: very stressful) using a 101-point Likert scale.”

measured_by: expected value of correct judgments Pe(t)
justification: “This study defines job performance as the expected value of the correct judgments at the forced decision time t… Pe(t) = Acc(t) × N(t).”
“In our behavioural experiments, we considered that an increased correct answer rate reflected the cognitive utility in the theoretical study.”

measured_by: drop-out rate / number of participants completing tasks (N)
justification: “We also considered that a decreased rate of dropout from the experiment reflected the cognitive frugality in the theoretical study.”
